name: StateService

properties.name: state$
properties.description: Saves the state. Should not be accessible directly. Use map or the getter to access the state. Use functions in the implementation to change the state.
properties.rawdescription:
Saves the state. Should not be accessible directly. Use map or the getter to access
the state. Use functions in the implementation to change the state.

description: A abstract state which should be included in each state.
rawdescription: A abstract state which should be included in each state.

methods.name: map
methods.rawdescription: Maps to a property and just returns that property.
methods.description: Maps to a property and just returns that property.

getSignature.name: state
getSignature.rawdescription: Should return the current state of this StateService
